triage_summary.root_cause: Issue appears to be a false positive. Python's !r format specifier already correctly escapes control characters including newlines in __repr__ output.
verification_targets: repr(Todo(id=1, text='a\nb')) should not contain literal newline character
repr output should be single line for any todo text input

notes: Investigation revealed the current implementation using !r format specifier already properly escapes control characters
Added explicit regression tests to ensure this behavior is maintained
Removed weak assertion that had a logical flaw (OR condition that always passed)
